## DataSource.removeFeatureState() method

Removes the state associated to the given feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeFeatureState(featureId: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  featureId | number | The id of the feature. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
